sn56.5:1.1: “Mendicants, whatever ascetics and brahmins truly wake up—in the past,
sn56.5:1.3: or present—all of them truly wake up to the four noble truths.
sn56.5:2.2: The noble truths of suffering, the origin of suffering, the cessation of suffering, and the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering. …
sn56.5:3.1: That’s why you should practice meditation …”
